original: intros i j x H. unfold in_interval, interval_union in *. destruct i as [a b]. destruct j as [a' b']. simpl in *. intros Hx. split. - destruct H as [H1 H2]. destruct (le_lt_dec a x) as [Hax|Hax], (le_lt_dec b x) as [Hbx|Hbx]. + lia. + lia. + left. apply H1. lia. + right. apply Nat.max_lub_lt. * apply H2. lia. * lia. - destruct Hx as [Hxl Hx]. apply Nat.max_lub in Hxl. destruct Hxl as [Hxl|Hxl]. + left. lia. + right. lia.
